lead_paragraph: First, the opening ceremony drew praise from all over the world. Then there were parties all over Rio de Janeiro, and Brazil's first medalist on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Brazilian Pride Soars After Opening Ceremony and 1st Medal
headline.main: Brazilian Pride Soars After Opening Ceremony and 1st Medal
